Html:
Hi,

Today I just found new bug in service: TransformClaimDocumentToFoXml. When you have a dental claim and want to transform 837 into dental claim form for printing purpose, the patient's gender on the dental form is mis-labeled.

For example, I have claim 837D with patient's gender as "F". When I use Transform837ToClaimDocument, the gender remains the same, which is good. But when you try next TransformClaimDocumentToFoXml, the PDF comes out as "M".

Please check.

Thanks
Jinpin
